cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##TOPN## BoardID, BoardDisplayName, BoardSiteID, Board_Subscription.*, NodeAliasPath, DocumentCulture FROM Board_Board LEFT JOIN Board_Subscription ON BoardID = SubscriptionBoardID LEFT JOIN View_CMS_Tree_Joined ON BoardDocumentID = DocumentID WHERE (SubscriptionUserID=@UserID) AND (##WHERE##)
